column5: Beansie went into Peterborough Hospital last week . . . .   'minor surgery' he said. Anybody hear from him yet?

Hey Photoz...I have been taking short turns at the 'Puter this morning...the VON nurse took the catheter out yesterday around noon but it is still uncomfortable sitting for any length of time...I read your e-mail but haven't replied yet...talk at you soon...  Cheers Mate
Hope all is okay my friend
The last time I heard Beansie was living in Miami. Oops, different Beansie, that one's from The Sopranos, hope your felling better soon fellow angler. When I hear the word catheter I cringe.
